mapper.select: SELECT FBC.FREE_BOARD_COMMENT_NO, FBC.FREE_BOARD_NO, FBC.CONTENT as content, FBC.CRE_DATE, FBC.MOD_DATE, FBC.MEMBER_NO, M.EMAIL, CASE WHEN FBC.MOD_DATE > FBC.CRE_DATE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_MODIFIED, CASE WHEN FBC.MOD_DATE > FBC.CRE_DATE THEN FBC.MOD_DATE ELSE FBC.CRE_DATE END AS COMPARE_DATE FROM FREE_BOARD_COMMENT FBC JOIN MEMBER M ON FBC.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE FBC.FREE_BOARD_NO = #{freeBoardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD_COMMENT (FREE_BOARD_COMMENT_NO, FREE_BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, CONTENT, CRE_DATE) VALUES (FREE_BOARD_COMMENT_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{freeBoardNo}, #{memberNo}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
